save_kubeconfig.value: terraform output kubeconfig | grep -v EOT > /.kube/cowboy.config && export KUBECONFIG=/.kube/cowboy.config

save_kubeconfig.after: terraform output kubeconfig | grep -v EOT > /.kube/cowboy.config && export KUBECONFIG=/.kube/cowboy.config

save_kubeconfig.value: terraform output kubeconfig | grep -v EOT > /.kube/cowboy.config && export KUBECONFIG=/.kube/cowboy.config

cert_manager_chart.description: Chart name to be installed. The chart name can be local path, a URL to a chart, or the name of the chart if repository is specified.

cert_manager_chart_version.description: Specify the exact chart version to install. If this is not specified, the latest version is installed.

cert_manager_create_namespace.description: Create the namespace if it does not yet exist. Defaults to false.

cert_manager_force_update.description: Force resource update through delete/recreate if needed. Defaults to false.

cert_manager_install_crds.description: Install cert-manager CRDs. If you don't install them here, you need to install them first.

cert_manager_namespace.description: The namespace to install the release into. Defaults to default namespace.

cert_manager_repository.description: Repository URL where to locate the requested chart.

cert_manager_skip_crds.description: If set, no CRDs will be installed. By default, CRDs are installed if not already present. Defaults to false.

github_repository_visibility.description: How visible is the GitHub repo?

github_vulnerability_alerts.description: Should vulnerability alerts be sent to repository owner?

rancher_chart.description: Chart name to be installed. The chart name can be local path, a URL to a chart, or the name of the chart if repository is specified.

rancher_chart_version.description: Specify the exact chart version to install. If this is not specified, the latest version is installed.

rancher_ingress_hostname.description: The FQDN hostname for the desired ingress.

rancher_namespace.description: The namespace to install the release into. Defaults to default cattle-system.

rancher_repository.description: Repository URL where to locate the requested chart.

rke_cluster_yaml.description: The filename for the cluster configuration.

rke_debug.description: Debug log level for RKE provisioning

rke_kubeconfig.description: The filename for the cluster kubeconfig.

rke_node_username.description: The username to connect to the node with.

rke_nodes.description: The list of nodes to install RKE on.

rke_ssh_key_path.description: The SSH private key to connect to the node with.

rke_statefile.description: The filename for the cluster state file.
